name: Deer Twitter,
description:
This is my capstone project for Ada Developer's Academy--based in Seattle, WA.

This was a fun project, where I learned basic C# and Unity in 3 weeks!
"Deer Twitter," is my attempt at making a piece of art using technology as a medium while showing off the skills learned at Ada. 

I 'm planning on adding a couple more tiny features on my own time:

  • Allowing the player to enter with Twitter accounts they want to pull tweets from.
  • The ability to share the goofy stories you come up with on social media.
  • Sound effects!
  • More sound effects!
  • Super duper want more animals in the background/animated environments.

Plus some minor bug fixes:

  • Will not embed in the browser with Twitter functionality turned on.

And, one extra note:

  • It's playable with controllers!
